title: Picadillo
markdown:
### Summary

Nathan,

I love you dearly.

Mom

### Ingredients 

* 1 lb ground beef
* ½ cup onion diced
* 1 green bell pepper diced
* 4 medium carrots diced
* 1 cups potato diced
* 4 cloves of garlic minced
* 8 ounces tomato sauce
* 1 ½ cup beef broth
* 1 teaspoon salt
* ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper
* 1 teaspoon ground cumin
* 1 teaspoon ground coriander
* 1 bay leaf
### Preparation

* Heat a large skillet over medium heat, add ground beef. Cook over medium heat while breaking up the meat. Cook until mostly browned, drain grease and return to heat
* Add diced onion, green bell pepper, carrots, and potatoes. Continue to cook over medium heat until onion and peppers are softened. Add garlic and cook an additional 30 seconds
* Pour in tomato sauce and beef broth. Add in seasonings and stir to combine. Add bay leaf
* Bring mixture to a simmer, cover and let cook for 10 min
* Remove lid, stir, and continue cooking with a lid off for an additional 10 min to until potatoes are softened and most of the liquid is gone
* Serve war with flour tortillas and rice
